attributes.action: Automatically give all trees protection with tree preservation orders
attributes.background: Trees are vital for biodiversity, air quality and heat and flood controls, particularly as we face growing challenges from climate change. Therefore, in order to deter and prevent developers, councils and individuals from removing vital trees, all trees should automatically be protected with a TPO.
